scripts.start: concurrently "cd react-code && npm start" "cd test-server && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd react-code && npm start" "cd test-server && npm run dev"
scripts.dev-dependencies: npm i && concurrently "cd test-server && npm i" "cd react-code && npm i"
scripts.product-dependencies: npm i --production && concurrently "cd test-server && npm i --production" "cd react-code && npm i --production"
